name: FC
description:
Some devils are attacking your damn great city! And they brought beer! What?..

Remember: the more, the worse.
Meat gives you life, but if you are too fat, your enemies will be fatter too! Only between us: you are their idol of beauty...
Beer doesn't give you anything, but it will attract MORE enemies. Did you just drink THEIR beer?!
Do not drink! Do. Not.

I created this game absolutely from scratch. Didn't use anything. I am very tired. Is this game balanced? Maybe. In some future. HAVE FUN :P
Did I create all what I planned? No :P

Used:
Unity
Blender
SFXR
Bosca SEOIL

Control:
WASD
Space for BOOM
LMB to shoot!
